title: An A-Ranked Adventurer’s “Slow-living” - Novel Updates
genre: Adult   Adventure   Fantasy   Romance   Seinen   Slice of Life
tags: Adapted to Manga   Adventurers   Beautiful Female Lead   C*nnilingus   Cooking   Dragons   Easy Going Life   Farming   First-time Interc**rse   F*llatio   Former Hero   Heartwarming   Hiding True Abilities   Hiding True Identity   H*ndjob   Kind Love Interests   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Male Protagonist   Marriage   Multiple POV   Naive Protagonist   Paizuri   Protagonist Strong from the Start   R-18   Shy Characters   Sword And Magic   Younger Love Interests
author: Renkinou   錬金王
description:
Aldred, the leader of a kingdom’s A-ranked party,『Black Silver』, has accomplished the task of slaying a dragon. However, he who has pursued strength his whole life has lost sight of his goal from taking down a monster of the strongest species. As he worried about what to do next in his life, it was the scenery of Nordende that popped up in his mind; A rural village by the countryside, full of natural beauty, which he only visited once during a quest in the past.

After declaring the disbandment of his party, he heads towards Nordende for a comfortable, relaxing life.>
